klipper-dgus_CR6 (DGUS Display for Klipper3D on Creality CR6 Printers)
  • Usage
  • General
  • Display Masks
  • Homing Mask
  • View page source

Homing Mask

Display Elements

  • X / Y / Z Position

Controls

  • Homing Button

  • Drive X Positive / Negative

  • Drive Y Positive / Negative

  • Drive Z Positive / Negative

  • Drive Distance Radio Button

  • User Position 1 / User Position 2 Button

  • Z-Tilt Button

Manually drive

To drive any of the axes the following procedure must be performed:

  1. Select “Drive Distance” using the “Drive Distance Radio Button”

  2. Select the approperiate Button.

User Position 1 / 2

These Buttons call a the DGUS_USER_POS1 / DGUS_USER_POS2 defined in the dgus_display_macros.cfg

This Macros can be freely defined by the user.

The DGUS_USER_POS1 moves the Printhead to a maintance position by default. (“WARTUNGSPOSTION” Macro from Cryd - Vyper Extended)
